--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "jgmath2000"=
 <jgmath2000@...> wrote:
>
> Hey there,
> 
> You are absolutely right, the =
manual forgot to include the Board library as a dependency and where to get=
 it:
> 
> http://libboard.sourceforge.net/  libBoard is used by the python =
visualizer to create document-ready images of substrates as displayed in ht=
tp://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/publications/2010/gauci.nc10.html .
> 
> I created a =
cmake build system for libboard that the developers have adopted into their=
 source tree, so the procedure of building libboard is similar to building =
tinyxmlplus.
> 
> I will update the manual and release a new version of the=
 code with the updated manual and a copy of libboard included in the next f=
ew days.
> 
>
